item.title: How i make TB so u cant do a tele command
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

else if (command.startsWith("pk")) { if(!teleblock) { teleportToX = 3243; teleportToY = 3517; } else if(teleblock) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } }
Should work, well it does for me.
The Tb time I forgot because I quit coding lol

Read full topic
